cs_02_ari_001.content: Wow, Koa, you were really well hidden!

cs_02_elinor_001.content: I want to try to camouflage!

cs_02_elinor_002.content: Can you help me hide in a spot where
I look like the things around me?

cs_02_koa_001.content: Yep. My shirt is the same colour
as the wall I was hiding by.

cs_02_olive_001.content: Some animals hide by looking the same as the

cs_02_olive_003.content: just like the mossy log it's standing on!

cs_02_olive_004.content: I read in my nature book that some animals
use camouflage to stay safe and hide from other animals.
